title: URF Questions
body:
1) Will URF become like an annual tradition? Every April 1st
2) With the new summoner icons - that could be further implemented into actual common gameplay with the customised deaths, do you think so? What are your thoughts on this?
3) Why isnt the cooldown of GA lowered in URF? That would be pretty cool...
4) What are, in your opinion, the most OP champions in URF currently...?
Thanks in advance :) - PvPRealm

replies.body:
1: possibly 
2: there was a red post about it and they said the URF finishers will probably not get into normal play
3: because that would be OP and annoying even by URF standards not to mention its insane synergy with the 60 second revive champs of URF
4: IMO Mordekaiser is insane due to his perma shield, Sona is constant heal poke and movement speed all throughout the game and AD malzahar gives absolutley stupid pushing to the point that games can be won in less then ten minutes
